items.name: Bread Pizza
items.description: Crispy toasted bread topped with tangy sauce, melted cheese, and fresh veggies — the perfect quick pizza snack.

items.name: Italian Double Cheese Pizza
items.description: A cheesy delight loaded with double mozzarella, Italian herbs, and classic tomato sauce for true pizza lovers.

items.name: Veg Sandwich
items.description: Freshly toasted sandwich filled with crunchy vegetables and creamy mayo — a light and tasty treat.

items.name: Aloo Mutter Sandwich
items.description: A flavorful mix of mashed potatoes and green peas stuffed between toasted bread slices.

items.name: Aloo Mutter Cheese Sandwich
items.description: Creamy cheese combined with spiced aloo-mutter filling — a satisfying fusion of Indian and continental flavors.

items.name: Plain Vada Pav
items.description: Mumbai’s favorite street food — spicy potato vada sandwiched in a soft pav with tangy chutneys.

items.name: Butter Vada Pav
items.description: Classic vada pav toasted in butter for extra flavor and crispiness — a true indulgence.

items.name: Cheese Butter Vada Pav
items.description: A cheesy twist on the traditional vada pav — buttery, spicy, and irresistibly creamy.

items.name: Plain Dabeli
items.description: Soft pav stuffed with spicy mashed potatoes, sweet chutney, and crunchy peanuts — a Kutch special!

items.name: Butter Dabeli
items.description: Buttery toasted pav filled with flavorful dabeli masala and topped with sev and pomegranate.

items.name: Cheese / Paneer Dabeli
items.description: Loaded with cheese or paneer for a creamy twist on the traditional dabeli — rich and delicious.

items.name: Veg Burger
items.description: A classic veggie burger with a crisp patty, lettuce, and creamy sauce in a soft bun.

items.name: Tikki Burger
items.description: Golden fried potato tikki paired with tangy sauces and fresh veggies — an Indian-style burger treat.

items.name: Paneer Burger
items.description: Soft bun loaded with crispy paneer patty, spicy mayo, and lettuce — a perfect protein-packed burger.

items.name: Cheese Burger
items.description: Melted cheese over a crispy patty with pickles and sauce — classic comfort food.

items.name: Double Cheese Burger
items.description: Double the cheese, double the fun — rich, creamy, and loaded with flavor in every bite.

items.name: Plain Pav Bhaji
items.description: A spicy, mashed vegetable curry served with soft pav — the street food classic of Mumbai.

items.name: Butter Pav Bhaji
items.description: Loaded with extra butter for that rich, creamy taste — the ultimate comfort food.

items.name: Paneer Pav Bhaji
items.description: A royal version of pav bhaji topped with grated paneer and a buttery finish.

items.name: Butter Maska Bun
items.description: Soft bun spread generously with butter — the perfect companion for your chai time.

items.name: Paneer Maska Bun
items.description: Fluffy bun filled with spiced paneer and buttery goodness — simple yet satisfying.

items.name: Cheese Maska Bun
items.description: Soft, buttery bun layered with rich melted cheese — melts in your mouth with every bite.
